User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user account within the FaustApp application, primarily for authentication purposes. Core data is written once on registration and is mostly read-only afterwards.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user account (matches Firebase Auth UID).

firstName.description: First name of the user. Should not be editable after registration.

lastName.description: Last name of the user. Should not be editable after registration.

firstLoginComplete.description: Flag to indicate if the user has completed the initial profile setup.

Member.title: Member
Member.description: Represents editable, detailed profile information for a team member.

userId.description: Foreign key linking to the User entity.

location.description: Location or address of the member.

gender.description: Gender of the member or team association.

GroupMember.title: Group Member
GroupMember.description: A denormalized, lightweight record representing a member within a specific group/team.

Appointment.title: Appointment
Appointment.description: Represents an event, training, or game in the calendar.

date.description: The date and time of the appointment.

Group.title: Group
Group.description: Represents a class (Obergruppe) or a team (Untergruppe).

parentId.description: The ID of the parent group (class) if it's a team.

Poll.title: Poll
Poll.description: Represents a survey or poll for team members.

options.description: The predefined answer options for the poll.

allowMultipleAnswers.description: Whether users can select multiple answers.

endDate.description: The date and time when the poll closes.

visibility.description: Defines who can see and vote in the poll.

teamIds.description: List of team IDs if visibility is specific.

votes.description: List of votes cast by users.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the poll was created.

NewsArticle.title: News Article
NewsArticle.description: Represents a news article or announcement.

title.description: The title of the news article.

content.description: The full content of the news article in markdown or plain text.

imageUrls.description: A list of URLs for images associated with the article.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the article was created.

TreasuryTransaction.title: Treasury Transaction
TreasuryTransaction.description: Represents a single financial transaction for a team's treasury.

teamId.description: The ID of the team this transaction belongs to.

description.description: Description of the transaction (e.g., 'Team dinner', 'Penalty: Late for training').

amount.description: The transaction amount. Positive for income, negative for expenses/penalties.

date.description: Timestamp of when the transaction occurred.

memberId.description: Optional ID of the member associated with this transaction (especially for penalties).

status.description: Status of the transaction, primarily for penalties.

Penalty.title: Penalty
Penalty.description: Defines a rule in a team's penalty catalog.

teamId.description: The ID of the team this penalty rule belongs to.

description.description: The description of the penalty (e.g., 'Late for training').

amount.description: The cost of the penalty (should be a positive number).

/users/{userId}.description: Stores core user authentication data. Name is read-only after creation. Accessible only by admins or the authenticated user.

/members/{memberId}.description: Stores editable user profile data. Accessible by admins or the owning user.

/groups/{groupId}/members/{memberId}.description: Denormalized, lightweight list of members for a specific group. Used for fast lookups of team rosters.

/appointments/{appointmentId}.description: Stores all appointments. Writable only by admins, readable by all users.

/groups/{groupId}.description: Stores all groups (classes and teams). Writable only by admins, readable by all users.

/polls/{pollId}.description: Stores all polls. Writable only by admins, readable by designated users.

/news/{newsId}.description: Stores all news articles. Writable only by admins, readable by all users.

/treasury/{transactionId}.description: Stores all financial transactions for all teams. Writable only by admins.

/penalties/{penaltyId}.description: Stores the penalty catalog rules for all teams. Writable only by admins.
